eu.dety.burp.joseph.attacks.bleichenbacher_pkcs1

Class BleichenbacherPkcs1Info

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.dety.burp.joseph.attacks.bleichenbacher_pkcs1.BleichenbacherPkcs1Info
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAttackInfo

    public class BleichenbacherPkcs1Info
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAttackInfo
    Bleichenbacher PKCS1 Attack Info

    Class holding meta data for the Bleichenbacher RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 attack and for preparing all necessary parameter for the actual attack.

    Attack vector generation based on and code (partly) taken from WS-Attacker

    See Also:
    WS-Attacker
